    public class ReceivingProcess
extends SendingProcess

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class core.BasicProcess

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ReceivingProcess(int id, int port)
      This is a process that is capable of receiving a message It can do both sending and receiving, hence it extends SendingProcess
